DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Acute kidney injury incidence sterofundin normal saline ; Resuscitation shock patient
DOC.brief_title: Normal Saline Versus Balance Salt Solution Resuscitation Kidney Function
DOC.detailed_description: Sample size : Compare proportion independent two group formula . n=sample size α risk 0.05 , Statistical power 80 % P1 =incidence acute kidney injury ( AKI ) control ( 0.6 ) * P2 =incidence acute kidney injury ( AKI ) balance salt solution ( 0.4 ) ** Ratanarat R , Hantaweepant C , Tangkawattanakul N , et al.The clinical outcome acute kidney injury critically ill Thai patient stratify RIFLE classification.J Med Assoc Thai 2009 Mar ; 92 Suppl 2:61-7. α risk 0.05 , Statistical power 80 % Sample size interim analysis 1.11 x 97 = 107.67 total 108 ( least 50 case arm )
DOC.criteria: Shock patient ( hypotension sign poor tissue perfusion ) Age < 18 yr Cardiogenic shock patient ( History ST elevation Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 35 % ) , Prolong shock > 24 hr , Received chloride rich crystalloid ( 0.9 % saline ) chloride rich colloid > 1000 ml within 72 hrs recruitment Donotresuscitation patient , Contraindication IV fluid administration pulmonary edema. , Stage V chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) , chronic Hemodialysis Peritonealdialyse
